hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #the Nocturne of Shadow# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: I once glued a set of false teeth to the Boomerang.^${12 39 c7}That came back to bite me.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Lakeside Laboratory#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #an Ice Trap#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #9# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that King Dodongo dislikes smoke.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #an Ice Trap#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Market Potion Shop#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #Deku Nut Capacity#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Zelda's Lullaby# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #the Requiem of Spirit#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #4# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Stick Capacity#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #1# major item.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Stick Capacity#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path of time.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Game Key# and #a Huge Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Forest Temple Small Key# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.
